thread.title: Comcast Pursues Sky While Assessing Bigger Move for Fox Assets

author: Shalini Ramachandran
title: Comcast Pursues Sky While Assessing Bigger Move for Fox Assets
text:
Comcast Corp. is taking on the Murdochs. The question is how far it wants to go.
The cable giant on Wednesday lobbed an official $31 billion proposal to buy European pay-TV operator Sky PLC, topping an existing offer from 21st Century Fox Inc., which already owns a 39% stake in Sky. Fox counts Rupert Murdoch and his family as major shareholders.
The... RELATED VIDEO A Brief History of Cable: Creating and Cutting the Cord The cable industry is undergoing a major transformation, as more Americans cut the cord on their cable subscriptions and flock to streaming services like Hulu and Netflix. So how did we get here? Illustration: Shaumbe Wright/WSJ
